faq.question: What is AI Expression Changer?
faq.answer: AI Expression Changer is an AI tool that changes facial expressions in photos and illustrations while preserving identity, lighting, texture, and art style. It can turn a neutral face into a smile, add surprise, soften anger, or introduce subtle emotional tweaks for portraits, headshots, anime/manga characters, and webtoon panels.

faq.question: How to use AI Expression Changer?
faq.answer: Using AI Expression Changer is simple! First upload a clear, front‚Äëfacing image (JPG/PNG/WEBP). Then choose the emotion (e.g., subtle smile, big smile, surprise, anger, sadness) and adjust intensity if needed. Click Generate to apply the new facial expression, then preview and download the result.

faq.question: How does AI Expression Changer work?
faq.answer: AI Expression Changer uses facial landmark detection, semantic understanding, and diffusion‚Äëbased image‚Äëto‚Äëimage editing to retarget expressions. It works by analyzing the face‚Äôs structure, lighting, and style, then applying an expression vector that reshapes features naturally while preserving identity and fine details.
